movies.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
movies.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.description: After the family matriarch passes away, a grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences, and begin to unravel dark secrets.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-shering technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of tow mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption

movies.title: Superbad
movies.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency
